DOC.brief_summary: Breast-conserving treatment ( BCT ) lead progressive deteriorate breast deformity . Fatgrafting ideal breast reconstruction BCT . The frequently utilized technique fat processing centrifugation . The PureGraft device ( Cytori Therapeutics , USA ) new method involve wash filter fat prepare graft . The investigator compare subjective objective outcome two fat-processing method , centrifugation PureGraft filtration . Thirty patient underwent breast reconstruction perform single surgeon ( OM ) BCT department April 2011 September 2012 . The patient preoperatively divide two group randomly : 15 receive fatgrafts process centrifugation , 15 receive fatgrafts process wash PureGraft bag . The patient follow 12-30 months.To measure subjective outcome , investigator distribute BREAST-Q questionnaire patient preoperatively one year postoperatively . The BCCT.core software evaluate objective outcome breast reconstruction fatgrafting .
DOC.brief_title: Outcomes After Centrifugation Versus PureGraft Fatgrafting Breast
